column3: I'll always prefer to play with women and hang out with women, and I'll always be a feminist.
Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men.
Men mourn for what they have lost; women for what they ain't got.
I never realized until lately that women were supposed to be the inferior sex.
I owe nothing to Women's Lib.
Most women set out to try to change a man, and when they have changed him they do not like him.
I demanded more rights for women because I know what women had to put up with.
I do not wish women to have power over men; but over themselves.
Emancipation of women has made them lose their mystery.
Women may not have it easy, but we are given a fairer chance to reach for the top.
Women must try to do things as men have tried. When they fail their failure must be but a challenge to others.

Advertising is a business of words, but advertising agencies are infested with men and women who cannot write. They cannot write advertisements, and they cannot write plans. They are helpless as deaf mutes on the stage of the Metropolitan Opera.

It's not just Bin Laden or just those that are involved in the counterterrorism effort. We've gotta cast the net broader than that. But I think it's a - very special tribute that we all owe to the bravery and courage of the men and women in the intelligence and military business who performed so well to finally get it done.
Elections are won by men and women chiefly because most people vote against somebody rather than for somebody.
The abortion license has not brought freedom and security to women. Rather, it has ushered in a new era of irresponsibility toward women and children, one that now begins before birth.
The most efficient water power in the world - women's tears.
Maternity leave and parental leave is absolutely vital for strengthening families. It's an issue for men and women.

I'm supportive of women, absolutely, and it's so gratifying to have girls come up and say, 'I'm really inspired by your guitar playing.' I mean no disrespect to the sisterhood, but musically I feel more drawn to things like Dirty Projectors, the National and Grizzly Bear.
I come from a line of great Sicilian women, and their mentality is to endure and push through to the other side.

I don't have time to write a mom blog, but I'm not against it. I think it's great when women talk about things. I'm all about female empowerment. There's a lot of lonely, lost moms out there. Moms need to be encouraged to tell the truth. There's a lot of glamour mommy stuff. It's OK to get real.
I married beneath me, all women do.
Kindness in women, not their beauteous looks, shall win my love.
In mid-life the man wants to see how irresistible he still is to younger women. How they turn their hearts to stone and more or less commit a murder of their marriage I just don't know, but they do.
Women are not pals enough with men, so we must make ourselves indispensable. After all, we have the greatest weapon in our hands by just being women.
The trouble with women umpires is that I couldn't argue with one. I'd put my arms around her and give her a little kiss.
That's the awesome part. Little girls now have a chance to look up and see women playing soccer, basketball, softball and now hockey - and know they can win a gold medal, too.
